EmailTemplate.name: State Pride
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Florida man. Carolina gal. Buckeye. What do these have in common? They’re all part of the Nation’s Greatest collection of designs available for customizing your Rambler.
The initial ten states in phase one were selected based on population, strong state pride, and states that are spread out regionally. But don’t worry! If you’re state isn’t in phase one, it will be added to the program in a future phase later this year.
To receive notifications on when your state will be available, sign up on YETI.com to receive our emails.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
